GT.content: donner reviendrait à prendre et prendre à donner; this would fold itself over on language/writing beyond logocentric closure
GT.linkedContent: donner reviendrait à prendre et prendre à donner; this would fold itself over on language/writing beyond logocentric closure

MONL.content: phallogocentrism, Western metaphysics > not a single homogenous thing
MONL.linkedContent: phallogocentrism, Western metaphysics > not a single homogenous thing

R.content: democratic sovereignty replaces theogonic politics with something just as phallocentric, phallo-paterno-filio-fraterno-ipsocentric (ipsocratic, though tautological, because ipseity already implies force)
R.linkedContent: democratic sovereignty replaces theogonic politics with something just as phallocentric, phallo-paterno-filio-fraterno-ipsocentric (ipsocratic, though tautological, because ipseity already implies force)

T.content: how to put one’s hands on tympanum so it can escape from hands of philosopher, so he can no longer recognize his phallogocentrism [play w/ mains, maintenant, maintain], no longer rediscover himself, no longer able to say: I will have anticipated it w/ absolute knowledge
T.linkedContent: how to put one’s hands on tympanum so it can escape from hands of philosopher, so he can no longer recognize his phallogocentrism [play w/ mains, maintenant, maintain], no longer rediscover himself, no longer able to say: I will have anticipated it w/ absolute knowledge

POOF.content: from afar, from on high, the political is an inhabited desert w/ not a woman in sight, are sisters just species of genus brother [‘Dear Brother Jacqueline’]? is she the absolute partisan, absolute enemy of the theory of the absolute enemy? > Schmitt’s phallogocentric neutralization of sexual difference, a sealing away (sous scellés), a house arrest, vigilance of the frightened watchman (de guetteur apeuré): the political is genderless
POOF.linkedContent: from afar, from on high, the political is an inhabited desert w/ not a woman in sight, are sisters just species of genus brother [‘Dear Brother Jacqueline’]? is she the absolute partisan, absolute enemy of the theory of the absolute enemy? > Schmitt’s phallogocentric neutralization of sexual difference, a sealing away (sous scellés), a house arrest, vigilance of the frightened watchman (de guetteur apeuré): the political is genderless

POOF.content: if there’s a single thesis [in POOF], it’s that there’s no choice [no choice of double gesture]: 1) the political is phallogocentrism, virtue is virile, thus woman’s slow/painful access to citizenship: we must go beyond the political 2) keep the ‘old name’ & engage other struggles, ‘partisan’ ones
POOF.linkedContent: if there’s a single thesis [in POOF], it’s that there’s no choice [no choice of double gesture]: 1) the political is phallogocentrism, virtue is virile, thus woman’s slow/painful access to citizenship: we must go beyond the political 2) keep the ‘old name’ & engage other struggles, ‘partisan’ ones

POOF.content: de-naturalization of fraternal authority (its de-construction), preference given to democratic fraternization > this is all possible, along w/ demand of a democracy to-come, because fraternity was never natural, never a fact [God is dead because God was always dead?]
POOF.linkedContent: de-naturalization of fraternal authority (its de-construction), preference given to democratic fraternization > this is all possible, along w/ demand of a democracy to-come, because fraternity was never natural, never a fact [God is dead because God was always dead?]

POOF.content: prepare a ‘political’ translation of what ‘must be (il faut)’ [could never exaggerate the aporias here: to multiply anticipations & announce the heading (cap)] > distort opposition btwn heteronomy/autonomy, the phília allergic to the other (dissymmetry, infinite distance) called for it, and in this call demands a democracy to come: an alterity w/out hierarchical difference at root of democracy > this would require an equality removed from phallogocentric schema of fraternity
POOF.linkedContent: prepare a ‘political’ translation of what ‘must be (il faut)’ [could never exaggerate the aporias here: to multiply anticipations & announce the heading (cap)] > distort opposition btwn heteronomy/autonomy, the phília allergic to the other (dissymmetry, infinite distance) called for it, and in this call demands a democracy to come: an alterity w/out hierarchical difference at root of democracy > this would require an equality removed from phallogocentric schema of fraternity

POOF.content: jusqu’ici [up until now], for several 1000 years, le temps d'un clin d'œil [the twinkling of an eye], tremors have been registered, archived, by the archons of the same family [phallogocentric fraternization]
POOF.linkedContent: jusqu’ici [up until now], for several 1000 years, le temps d'un clin d'œil [the twinkling of an eye], tremors have been registered, archived, by the archons of the same family [phallogocentric fraternization]

POOF.content: the 2 major questions of deconstruction: 1) history of concepts & so-called ‘textual’ hegemony 2) phallogocentrism (here qua phratrocentrism)
POOF.linkedContent: the 2 major questions of deconstruction: 1) history of concepts & so-called ‘textual’ hegemony 2) phallogocentrism (here qua phratrocentrism)

SP.content: [re: truth-castration as man’s affair, and woman’s suspension of it] [English translation seems horrible] Derrida is asking that we take off the head (décapitonner) of Lacan’s discourse, w/ its truth speaking, castration & phallocentrism > by deploying metaphorics of veil

ATIA.content: Derrida spoke of carnophallogocentrism to name sacrificial scene
ATIA.linkedContent: Derrida spoke of carnophallogocentrism to name sacrificial scene

O.content: la logique (est) de ce qui revient au père (mort—plus que jamais) comme à la loi et au logos: la relève elle même > elle est vraie et elle constitue la vérité du logocentrisme > signifier sublated in process of meaning > [Derrida links Freud’s “only one” libido (masculine) to the rightness of reason]

O.content: Derrida not disputing la raison elle-même, the one (masculine) libido—“why not?” > to stand on head [call for feminine libido?] would put back/leave in place truth of phallocentric dialectic

SW.content: for Freud (the Freud of Penismangel and pseudo-discovery of weaving), mother = matter = materia = Madeira = Holz = hylē

SW.content: theory (beyond theory) of fetishism at moment of verdict, w/ whole history engaged in it (Freud, Exodus, St. Paul, the en abyme of un ver à soie), thought of the event w/out revealed/unveiled truth, w/out phallogocentrism, w/out greco-judeo-paulino-islamo-freud-heidggeriano-lacanian [no christiano!] veil, w/out (un)veiling of phallus

DPi.content: but will history/horizon resist deconstruction of scaffolding of these scaffolds? scaffolding as construction/architecture to be deconstructed, the speculation, calculation, market (speculative idealism) that provides its supports; deconstruction of carno-phallogocentrism always deconstruction of DP’s historical scaffolding > history as scaffolding of this scaffold

WAP.content: deconstruction had to recognize internal destructuration of phallogocentric onto-theology, otherwise would have reproduced classical logic
WAP.linkedContent: deconstruction had to recognize internal destructuration of phallogocentric onto-theology, otherwise would have reproduced classical logic

WAP.content: onto-theological, phallogocentric principles of metaphysics guided by question “what is?” subordinates all fields to onto-encyclopedic instant: leads to unity of philosophical university

EW.content: carno-phallogocentrism: a heterotautology as a priori synthesis, i.e. “speculative idealism,” “becoming-subject of substance,” “absolute knowledge,” “speculative Good Friday” > idealizing interiorization of phallus and its necessity of its passage through the mouth

EU.content: phallocentrism & logocentrism (essentially indissociable) wherever I could spot them > everywhere, even where unnoticed
EU.linkedContent: phallocentrism & logocentrism (essentially indissociable) wherever I could spot them > everywhere, even where unnoticed

FV.content: classical [mis]treatment of animal [eg. in Lacan] condenses system’s greatest obscurity: obscurantist resistance in history of (humanist/phallogocentric) metaphysics

FV.content: point de capiton safeguards indivisible, living, non-fragmentary integrity of phallus
FV.linkedContent: point de capiton safeguards indivisible, living, non-fragmentary integrity of phallus

FV.content: Lacan integrates Freudian phallocentrism w/ phonocentric Saussurean semio-linguistics

FV.content: voice guards against the phallus becoming divisible, being reduced to part object, voice as ideal guardianship of partial/divisible object: mors disséminable (ce qui tombe)
FV.linkedContent: voice guards against the phallus becoming divisible, being reduced to part object, voice as ideal guardianship of partial/divisible object: mors disséminable (ce qui tombe)

FV.content: systemic & historical link btwn idealization, relève (Aufhebung), and the voice > Lacan’s elevation of signifier
FV.linkedContent: systemic & historical link btwn idealization, relève (Aufhebung), and the voice > Lacan’s elevation of signifier

FV.content: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”
FV.linkedContent: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”

FV.content: Lacan reversed Hegel: not ideal signified but ideal signifier
FV.linkedContent: Lacan reversed Hegel: not ideal signified but ideal signifier

FV.content: all phallogocentrism articulated based on (individual, perceptual, cultural, historical) situation where phallus is mother’s desire (to the extent she doesn’t have it) > though phallus isn’t the organ, it mostly symbolizes the penis > thus, phallogocentrism as androcentrism & woman as absolute Other
FV.linkedContent: all phallogocentrism articulated based on (individual, perceptual, cultural, historical) situation where phallus is mother’s desire (to the extent she doesn’t have it) > though phallus isn’t the organ, it mostly symbolizes the penis > thus, phallogocentrism as androcentrism & woman as absolute Other

FV.content: [re: psychoanalysis] institution built on male child’s experience > at stage of genital organization, there’s only maleness (antithesis isn’t femaleness but being castrated): phallogocentrism is no accident/error, its old, enormous root must be accounted for [described] > but, its description is a “participant” when it induces a practice, ethics, institution, a politics that insures truth of a tradition

FV.content: depth is height, flows out (débouche) toward the high, precisely the mouth (bouche) in which is “incarnated” the Nous, Logos, phallic signifier > reason is reason itself, aura raison, logic of kettle (a check [traite] drawn from reason): there is only one libido, it is masculine in nature

FV.content: one reason, male libido, altus, at the bottom of things—highest truth
FV.linkedContent: one reason, male libido, altus, at the bottom of things—highest truth

WBH.content: insidiously reproduce the old model (fundamentally phallogocentric) in modern University > would women’s studies become another cell in university beehive [?]

CHOR.content: “phallogocentrism,” complicity of Western metaphysics w/ notion of male firstness > mistakes/anchorings of Western rationality assuage hermeneutic anxiety
CHOR.linkedContent: “phallogocentrism,” complicity of Western metaphysics w/ notion of male firstness > mistakes/anchorings of Western rationality assuage hermeneutic anxiety

CHOR.content: phallogocentrism, “patrix,” is insurance against return of that which is feared as most agonizing risk
